job.title: Site Reliability Engineer II
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: Who we are looking for What you will work on  As a site reliability engineer, you will be passionate about maximum availability, observability, reliability, security, and performance for Nike Digital Order Management systems.  SREs perform deep problem analysis, detect infrastructure or code defects, define, report, and create observability processes for Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), and work with product delivery teams to provide long term solutions to production issues.  What you bring
